name: N30N-C17Y
description:
Created for the PROCJAM19.

PROCEDURAL CONTENT: Buildings, Cars, People & Music. Mostly using palette composition. The music uses a very simple Markov random chain.

CONTROLS: keyboard. LEFT/RIGHT arrows for horizontal aim, UP/DOWN for vertical movement, SPACE/CONTROL keys for forward backwards respectively.

TOOLS and EXTERNAL ASSETS: Unity3D, Blender, Fruity Loops. Rain uses Unity assets.

[IMPORTANT]: if the performance is poor (bad framerate, music drops), please use the downloadable version.
